LanguageData.Messtin.label: Messtin
LanguageData.Messtin.description: It is used for cooking rice and simple cooking. Cooking speed is reduced by 30%, because there is only a minimum of equipment.

LanguageData.RiceCooker.label: Rice cooker
LanguageData.RiceCooker.description: A convenient cooking table when cooking rice or making soup. Because it already has the latest cookware cooking speed is increased 30%.
